Hero.title: Matheo LANG
Hero.subtitle: Your project deserves an outstanding showcase. My goal is to design a solution that matches your ambitions -

Services.title: Services
Services.subtitle: What I can do for you

0.title: Showcase Website
0.description: Create a strong online presence with a modern and responsive showcase website. Ideal for highlighting your products, services, or activities with smooth navigation and an attractive design. (WordPress or other CMS)

1.title: Backend Development
1.description: Build a robust and scalable backend using the latest technologies (Node.js, Python, Go). Perfect for managing your data, security, and information flows.

2.title: Full-Stack Web App
2.description: I develop high-performance interactive web applications using modern technologies. My goal is to create robust and scalable solutions that perfectly meet your specific needs. I handle every stage of development, from design to production, with a focus on code quality and application scalability.

3.title: Maintenance and Technical Support
3.description: I offer regular maintenance services for your websites and web applications to ensure they remain up-to-date, functional, and secure. Whether it's content updates, bug fixes, or technical adjustments, I make sure your project continues to operate optimally. This allows you to focus on your goals without worrying about technical aspects.

4.title: Third-Party Service Integration
4.description: I integrate external APIs and third-party services into your applications to enhance their functionality. Whether you need a payment solution, a geolocation system, or another external feature, I ensure a smooth, fast, and secure integration. This helps maximize your tools' efficiency and provide an enhanced user experience.

Projets.title: Projects
Projets.subtitle: Technical achievements
Projets.subtitle2: From showcase websites to interactive platforms, my projects reflect a user-focused and innovative approach. Every detail matters: intuitive navigation, striking designs, and optimized performance. Discover how my solutions transform ideas into unique digital experiences.
